meanings.definition: A type of diuretic medication used to treat fluid retention.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed furosemides to help reduce swelling in my legs.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes misuse furosemides to try to lose weight quickly.
meanings.sent3: After taking furosemides, I felt like a deflating balloon!
meanings.sent4: Her body felt lighter after taking furosemides, as if shedding excess water weight.
meanings.sent5: The image of furosemides flushing out excess fluid stuck in my mind.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacy ran out of furosemides, so I had to wait for a new shipment.
meanings.sent2: The doctor reminded me to take all the furosemides he prescribed.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled the furosemides all over the counter!
meanings.sent4: The furosemides on the shelf looked like tiny white pills of relief.
meanings.sent5: Counting the furosemides before taking them became a daily routine.
